ygData.subject: Re: To Olympus
ygData.msgSnippet: Motherload froze where she was. All the Airtankers had. They all looked at Grimlock. Bombtube laughed nervously as if the name had meant something bad.

Motherload froze where she was. All the Airtankers had. They all
looked at =
Grimlock. Bombtube laughed nervously as if the name had
meant something bad=
.

Bombtube: Jotunn.... He, huh... He asked for Stormblaze? W-Why was that?=


Skysword: Screw the reason, Grimlock. What in the darkest pits of the
Voi=
d happened there?
